articles.title: Judge says government can't limit passport sex markers for many transgender, nonbinary people - AP News
articles.description: A federal judge has blocked the Trump administration from limiting passport sex markers for many transgender and nonbinary Americans. The ruling covers transgender and nonbinary Americans who are without a valid passport or need to apply for a new one within …
articles.content:
BOSTON (AP) A federal judge has blocked the Trump administration from limiting passport sex markers for many transgender and nonbinary Americans.

articles.title: America’s spies say Iran wasn’t building a nuclear weapon. Trump dismisses that assessment - PBS
articles.description: Trump's national intelligence director, Tulsi Gabbard, told Congress in March that Iran's supreme leader had not reauthorized the dormant program.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) Tulsi Gabbard left no doubt when she testified to Congress about Iran’s nuclear program earlier this year.
